result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ تُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُۖ وَبَرَزُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ
result.translation: 48. Maalinta marka arlada loo beddeli arlo kale iyo samooyinka, waxaana la hor keeni (uumanka oo idil) Alle horti, Waaxidka, Sandulleeyaha (isla weynayaasha).
